item.title: NASA utforskar planeterna
item.description: Cassini Rymdsonden vid saturnus som tagit fantastiska bilder. Länk: https://saturn.jpl.nasa.gov/ Juno Rymdsonden vid Jupiter som tagit fantastiska bilder. Länk: https://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/juno/main/index.html

item.title: Poddar om psykologi, psykiatri och kognition
item.description: Hidden brain Hidden Brain’s host Shankar Vedantam reveals the unconscious patterns that drive human behavior, the biases that shape our choices, and the triggers that direct the course of our relationships. Länk: https://www.npr.org/podcasts/510308/hidden-brain Rekommenderade episoder: I’m Right, You’re Wrong, Radio Replay: Loving the Lie . Radio Replay: Crime As A Disease. Oxford psychiatry podcast These podcasts provide an introduction to core topics in psychiatry, and to research undertaken in the Oxford University Department of Psychiatry.

item.title: Poddar om vetenskap
item.description: Science podcast En podd från American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) som sammanfattar intressanta vetenskapsnyheter från olika fält, iblad med intervjuer av forskare som ligger bakom nya rön. Länk: http://www.sciencemag.org/podcasts Intressanta avsnitt: Machine consciousness, asteroid origins, and the oldest forests.
